The British School of Guangzhou
Dear Parents,
The second hand uniform shop will be selling uniform next week during the below time slots in the spacious gymnasium of the Nanhu Building located on the South Lake Campus (Nan Hu). All proceeds go to our affiliated charity Action Aid. I will inform you in the first week of term the total money raised from this.
Monday 18th August: 11:00am-13:00pm
Tuesday 19th August: 11:00am-13:00pm
Wednesday 20th August: 11:00am-13:00pm
Thanks and best wishes,
Gemma Campbell
The British School of Guangzhou
